What_It_Demonstrates: Research into encryption and data concealment techniques prior to data extraction
Evidential_Notes: Recovered from deleted space; supports preparatory intent but does not confirm execution

What_It_Demonstrates: Interest in anonymisation services and financial obfuscation concepts
Evidential_Notes: Indicates research activity; content alone does not prove subsequent misuse

What_It_Demonstrates: Secure storage of extracted sensitive data using encryption
Evidential_Notes: Encryption prevents direct content review; indicates intent to protect data

What_It_Demonstrates: Creation and modification of files associated with data aggregation
Evidential_Notes: Metadata supports staging activity but not data origin

What_It_Demonstrates: Compression and aggregation of multiple files prior to storage or transfer
Evidential_Notes: Supports preparation for exfiltration; contents partially inaccessible

What_It_Demonstrates: Deliberate hiding of access credentials using encoding techniques
Evidential_Notes: Decoded via forensic tooling; supports concealment but not user identity

What_It_Demonstrates: Hidden data embedded within image media
Evidential_Notes: Recovered through forensic analysis; indicates deliberate obfuscation

What_It_Demonstrates: Manipulation of file headers and extensions to mask true content
Evidential_Notes: Supports concealment techniques; requires corroboration

What_It_Demonstrates: Attempted removal of artefacts following data handling activity
Evidential_Notes: Recovered from unallocated space; deletion timing approximate

What_It_Demonstrates: User interaction with files relevant to the incident
Evidential_Notes: Confirms access activity; cannot distinguish between shared users

What_It_Demonstrates: Execution or opening of key files linked to the investigation
Evidential_Notes: Supports file access; shortcut creation time may differ from execution

What_It_Demonstrates: Navigation to directories associated with sensitive files
Evidential_Notes: Supports directory access; not proof of file manipulation

What_It_Demonstrates: Preview generation of files linked to the investigation
Evidential_Notes: Supports file visibility; does not prove content access

What_It_Demonstrates: Use of tools consistent with encryption or data handling behaviour
Evidential_Notes: Supports tool usage; does not confirm purpose

What_It_Demonstrates: Timestamped activity aligning with data handling events
Evidential_Notes: Log completeness dependent on system configuration

What_It_Demonstrates: Use of OS-level hiding techniques to obscure artefacts
Evidential_Notes: Supports concealment intent; files remain recoverable

What_It_Demonstrates: Intermediate file creation during processing of sensitive data
Evidential_Notes: Supports active data manipulation; limited contextual detail

What_It_Demonstrates: Partial reconstruction of multi-part access credentials
Evidential_Notes: Supports access capability; full credential not published

What_It_Demonstrates: System configuration adjusted to support subsequent activity
Evidential_Notes: Change timing supports preparation phase

What_It_Demonstrates: Alignment of multiple artefacts into a coherent incident timeline
Evidential_Notes: Supports sequencing; dependent on system clock accuracy

What_It_Demonstrates: Indications of attempted clean-up or trace removal activity
Evidential_Notes: Supports anti-forensic intent; effectiveness limited

What_It_Demonstrates: Activity performed under shared credentials
Evidential_Notes: Prevents definitive attribution to a single individual
